articles.author: Melissa Repko, Gabrielle Fonrouge
articles.title: Coach owner Tapestry to acquire Michael Kors, Jimmy Choo parent Capri Holdings for $8.5 billion - CNBC
articles.description: The deal would create an American fashion giant that brings Coach, Kate Spade, Stuart Weitzman, Versace, Jimmy Choo and Michael Kors under one house.
articles.content:
Tapestry, the fashion conglomerate behind Coach and Kate Spade, will acquire competitor Capri Holdings in a $8.5 billion deal announced Thursday. 
The transaction will create an American fashion gia… [+3844 chars]
